data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 Elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Bane Shield
data.description: A baneful aura surrounds you for 10 seconds, lashing out for 100 Spirit damage at any enemies who hit you.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Blast Wave
data.description: A great burst of corrupted winds tears at all targets within 20 feet, inflicting 76 damage. If under the effect of a Discordant Aura, Wounds are lowered by 75 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Bulwark
data.description: Repairs a friendly keep door for 5% of it's total health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Chaotic Advantage
data.description: Any time you parry an attack, you will regain 75 Action Points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Cleave
data.description: A powerful overhand blow that inflicts 159 damage and can not be defended against.

data.name: Corrupting Horror
data.note:
May only use one Chaotic Aura at a time.
Requires 5 points in Path of Corruption
data.description:
The power of the Warp radiates out from you, placing horrifying visions inside the heads of all foes within 30 feet, causing their spells to build up 25% slower.
This curse will last until another curse is activated, or this curse is toggled off. After this, the curse will linger for another 12 seconds

data.name: Corrupting Retribution
data.note: May only use one Chaotic Aura at a time.
data.description:
You instill the power of the warp in your groupmates within 100 feet, causing their corrupted power to regenerate flesh and bone, healing them for 24 health over 3 seconds every time they defend an attack.
This curse will last until another curse is activated, or this curse is toggled off. After this, the curse will linger for another 12 seconds

data.name: Corrupting Wrath
data.note: May only use one Chaotic Aura at a time.
data.description:
You call upon the power of the warp to wither your opponents' mind and muscles, reducing the toughness of all enemies within 30 feet by 75. During this time, group members within 100 feet are emboldened, increasing their toughness by 75.
This curse will last until another curse is activated, or this curse is toggled off. After this, the curse will linger for another 12 seconds

data.name: Corruptive Power
data.description: Path of Corruption abilities will now cost 35% less action points.

data.name: Crippling Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, they will deal only 90% damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Critical Suppression
data.description: Suppression will now also reduce the victim's chances to defend against attacks by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Deflect Oil
data.description: 10% reduction in damage taken by Oil siege engines. You will also protect two other group mates within 30 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that reduces armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Destined For Victory
data.description: Any time you block an attack, you gain 200 points of Morale. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Dire Shielding
data.description: Bane Shield will now also protect any of your allies within 30 feet and last 7 seconds longer.

data.name: Discordant Fluctuation
data.note: May only use one Chaotic Aura at a time.
data.description:
The power of the Warp fluctuates violently around you and your allies within 100 feet. Enemies that dare to use offensive magical abilities against a groupmate in this radius will be hit with a magical backlash, causing them 46 Spirit damage.
This curse will last until another curse is activated, or this curse is toggled off. After this, the curse will linger for another 12 seconds

data.name: Discordant Instability
data.note: May only use one Chaotic Aura at a time.
data.description:
You tear at the fabric of reality, warping the world around you. Enemies within 30 feet will have all their resistances reduced by 118. During this time, groupmates within 100 feet have all their resistances increased by 236.
This curse will last until another curse is activated, or this curse is toggled off. After this, the curse will linger for another 12 seconds

data.name: Discordant Turbulence
data.note:
May only use one Chaotic Aura at a time.
Requires 5 points in Path of Discord
data.description:
The power of the Warp melds with the mind of your enemies, causing healing on any foes within 30 feet to be 25% less effective.
This curse will last until another curse is activated, or this curse is toggled off. After this, the curse will linger for another 12 seconds

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Dizzying Blow
data.description: A blow to the head which inflicts 134 damage and snares your target, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Downfall
data.description: A fierce blow that knocks down your opponent for 3 seconds and inflicts 159 damage.

data.name: Dreadful Agony
data.note: May only use one Chaotic Aura at a time.
data.description:
You call on the power of the Warp, channeling warped energy in to the hearts and minds of your opponents. All enemies within 30 feet will take 99 Spirit damage every 3 seconds.
This curse will last until another curse is activated, or this curse is toggled off. After this, the curse will linger for another 12 seconds

data.name: Dreadful Fear
data.note: May only use one Chaotic Aura at a time.
data.description:
You call upon the power of the warp to instill a bone chilling fear in your opponents within 30 feet of you, reducing their Strength by 75. During this time, the Strength of any groupmates within 100 feet is increased by 75.
This curse will last until another curse is activated, or this curse is toggled off. After this, the curse will linger for another 12 seconds

data.name: Dreadful Terror
data.note:
May only use one Chaotic Aura at a time.
Requires 5 points in Path of Dread
data.description:
The power of the Warp encases you in a terrifying visage. All enemies within 30 feet will lose 20 Action Points every 5 seconds. All groupmates within 100 feet will regain 20 Action Points every 5 seconds.
This curse will last until another curse is activated, or this curse is toggled off. After this, the curse will linger for another 12 seconds

data.name: Embrace the Winds
data.description: All healing used on you becomes 15% more effective.

data.name: Enraged Blow
data.description: A powerful blow that does 134 damage and has significantly increased threat against monsters

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Feed on the Weary
data.description: Withering Blow will now drain 40 Action Points, and you will gain as many action points as the victim lost.

data.name: Flawless Armor
data.description: Reduces the chance that an enemy will critically hit you by 10%.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: You deal 15% more damage and all enemy monsters will hate you 15% less than normal, but your armor is reduced by 33%.

data.name: Guard
data.description: You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Hastened Dismissal
data.description: Reduces Repel's cooldown time by 50% (when you are wielding a Greatweapon) and increases the length of the knockback.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Impenetrable Armor
data.description: You are briefly covered with an impenetrable set of scales. For the next 20 seconds, up to 7200 damage will be absorbed.

data.name: Inevitable Changing
data.description: A strong melee attack that deals 600 damage and restores all of your AP.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Mixed Defenses
data.description: Any time you block an attack, your chance to parry is increased by 25% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Modify War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: You shield the Ram absorbing 1500 damage over the next 30 seconds.

data.name: Oppressing Blows
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% when you are wielding a Greatweapon.

data.name: Oppression
data.note:
Requires Block or Parry
Requires 13 points in Path of Corruption
data.description: A thunderous shield slam that inflicts 184 damage, increases your armor by 618 for 20 seconds and reduces your damage taken by 15% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Petrify
data.description: The land around you warps and changes, encasing up to 4 nearby opponents in hardened stone. Effected opponents are rooted for 10 seconds and cannot move. Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.

data.name: Piercing Repel
data.description: Repel will now apply a buff on you that will reduce the armor penetration of all attackers by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Power from the Gods
data.description: Increases your Action Point regenration by 15.

data.name: Quake
data.description: You shake the very earth, dealing 154 Spirit damage to all opponents within 40 feet in front of you, staggering everyone for up to 3 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Quickened Discord
data.description: Reduces Blast Wave's cooldown time by 5 seconds and Touch Of Palsy's cooldown time by 10 seconds.

data.name: Ravage
data.description: You channel the fell powers of the warp into your blade unleashing a devastating strike that does 159 Spiritual damage.

data.name: Raze
data.description: Repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Relentless
data.description: You hack at your enemy with brutal strikes for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to six times and dealing 114 damage with each hit. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Rending Blade
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Requires 13 points in Path of Dread
data.description: Your Demonic blade overpowers your enemy's defense causing 134 Spirit damage to all enemies within 25 feet in front of you. This attack is undefendable.

data.name: Repel
data.description: Forceful blow that deals 159 damage and knocks back players and knocks down monsters.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Increases Toughness by 160.

data.name: Seeping Wound
data.description: Your blade churns with Spiritual energies and will Cripple your target, inflicting 285 damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Sever Blessing
data.description: You sever one Blessing from your enemy and do 134 damage

data.name: Shatter Faith
data.description: A thunderous curse shatters the air, inflicting 800 damage to all targets within 30 feet and dispelling a blessing.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Siphoned Energy
data.description: Any time you disrupt a spell, you will regain 105 health, and your movement speed will be increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Sprout Carapace
data.description: In a chaotic surge of growth, everyone in the group's skin hardens, increasing Armor by 825 and all Resists by 315 for 30 seconds. Everyone receives 100 AP as well.

data.name: Suppression
data.description: A quick blow that causes 134 damage and improves your defensive position, increasing your chance to parry by 25% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Tainted Wound
data.description: If an enemy is directly healed while suffering from your Seeping Wound, the healer will suffer 225 damage.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Throwing Axe
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts 97 damage. Has a chance to deal 696 damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Tooth of Tzeentch
data.description: Stabs into opponent for 159 damage. For the next 5 seconds, Tooth Of Tzeentch will cause an additional 100 Spirit damage on the next damaging attack made by everyone in your group within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Touch of Palsy
data.description: You inflict 109 damage on the target. Target's legs become brittle for 10 seconds, causing them to suffer 75 Spirit damage for every half second they are moving.

data.name: Tzeentch's Amplification
data.description: For 15 seconds, Tzeentch amplifies the effects of all heals cast on you by 300%.

data.name: Tzeentch's Reflection
data.description: You are surrounded by magical barrier increasing your willpower by 75 and disrupt chance by 25% for 10 seconds. During this time, any spell you disrupt will silence it's caster for 3 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Warped Flesh
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Warping Embrace
data.description: A surge of chaotic energy ripples forward inflicting 240 damage to everyone 40 feet in front of you. The surge of power clings to it's victims, snaring them by 40% for 15 seconds.

data.name: Withering Blow
data.description: You release chaotic energies through your blade, withering your opponent's limbs causing 134 damage and removing 30 Action Points.
